resources.string: The Desi Café range of Tea Posts – is a range of sprawling garden cafés that are architecturally beautiful. They are designed to include multiple different seating areas surrounding a central kitchen space – ready to cater to a large no. of people. The Desi Café gives the guests a lavish experience with amazing furniture, interior decoration, and lovely plantations. The visitors can enjoy both indoor as well as outdoor hospitality at The Desi Café without worrying about the seating capacity. Also, all The Desi Cafés have an amphitheater where events and large-scale gatherings can be easily organized.
